section.title: A little bit of history
section.para: By that day, the mybatis-guice project is maintained by the MyBatis.org team.

section.title: Requirements
section.para: Before starting reading the manual, it is very important you're familiar with both MyBatis Migration Tool and Apache Maven and therminology, otherwise it would be very difficult to understand the described context.

section.title: Acknowledgements
section.para: A special thanks goes to all the special people who made the Maven Migration Plugin a reality, above all Clinton Begin, who's strongly supporting the subprojects proliferation.
